query:
UPDATE domain_orders 
SET 
  status = 'active',
  namecom_order_id = '26487104',
  cloudflare_zone_id = '448dd94143105c68ee22ee8dce995278',
  nameservers = '["annabel.ns.cloudflare.com", "braden.ns.cloudflare.com"]',
  dns_status = 'configured',
  ssl_status = 'pending',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE domain_name = 'lulubaby.xyz';
